Thurs., Jan. 24: Join us as we journey down memory lane at Ogie's Trailer Park.

This year the ACLU of RI is turning 60!

Join us as we journey down memory lane at Ogie's Trailer Park on Thursday, January 24. Mix and mingle with other civil liberties supporters, and help us kick-off our 60th year of fighting for the rights of all in the Ocean State.
